thread.title: Amazingly French! very classy
thread.title_full: Amazingly French! very classy - Review of Hotel Balzac, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Travellerano911
title: Amazingly French! very classy
text: My wife and I had a lovely stay in this very classy hotel. The rooms are very romantic and charming, extremely clean and its location is really perfect! you enjoy the very classy atmosphere that this hotel and its friendly staff create! We strongly recommend it!
